name: callousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that is unkind, cruel, and without sympathy or feeling for other people: She felt the rules showed a callousness and indifference to the suffering of others. I am appalled by the callousness of some business people. See
callous
More examplesFewer examplesThey had an attitude of callousness to the needs of the rural population. He exercised authority with small-minded callousness. I cannot believe their callousness in carrying out such exploitation of other human beings.
